oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Baggarly, Isabel, 1890 May
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Isabel Baggarly, “of the 16 District of Davidson County and State of Tennessee,” dated March 15, 1890. Illustrates the first page of the document. Baggarly’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court during the May Term 1890, recorded in “Will Book 30, Page 476.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baggarly family
